title: Amazon Is Now Offering Novo Nordisk's Wegovy Pill in Its Pharmacy. Here's How That Could Affect Hims & Hers, WW International, and GoodRx Holdings.
title_zh: 亚马逊现已在其药房出售诺和诺德的 Wegovy 药丸。以下是这对 Hims & Hers、WW International 和 GoodRx Holdings 的影响。
summary: There's another fight brewing around GLP-1 drugs -- this time on the delivery side.
summary_zh: 另一场围绕 GLP-1 药物的争论正在酝酿之中——这次是在给药方面。

title: Salesforce Army Megadeal Tests AI Vision And Leadership Stability
title_zh: Salesforce Army Megadeal 测试 AI 愿景和领导力稳定性
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) secured a US$5.6b, 10-year contract with the US Army, expanding its role as a core software provider to a major government customer.
summary_zh: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) 与美国陆军签订了一份价值 5.6 亿美元、为期 10 年的合同，将其作为核心软件提供商的角色扩展到主要政府客户。

title: Apple’s Gemini Deal And EU Ruling Reframe Long Term AI Story
title_zh: 苹果的 Gemini 交易和欧盟裁决重新构建了长期的人工智能故事
summary: Apple (NasdaqGS:AAPL) has agreed to integrate Alphabet's Gemini AI models into Siri and other devices, signaling a shift in its AI approach. The partnership is aimed at upgrading Apple's virtual assistant and broader AI features across its ecosystem.
summary_zh: 苹果公司（NasdaqGS：AAPL）已同意将 Alphabet 的 Gemini AI 模型集成到 Siri 和其他设备中，这标志着其 AI 方法的转变。此次合作旨在升级苹果的虚拟助手以及整个生态系统中更广泛的人工智能功能。

title: Private Credit Giants Back A$1.4 Billion BGH Loan for Aspen Asia Deal
title_zh: 私人信贷巨头为阿斯彭亚洲交易提供 14 亿澳元的 BGH 贷款
summary: Goldman Sachs Asset Management, Blackstone and Apollo are set to fund covenant-lite financing for BGH's acquisition of Aspen Pharmacare's Asia Pacific operations.
summary_zh: 高盛资产管理公司、Blackstone 和 Apollo 将为 BGH 收购 Aspen Pharmacare 亚太业务提供低门槛融资。

title: KKR to Acquire Pro Sports Investor Arctos in $1.4 Billion Deal
title_zh: KKR 将以 14 亿美元的价格收购职业体育投资者 Arctos
summary: KKR agreed to acquire Arctos Partners, an investor in professional sports franchise stakes, in a deal initially valued at $1.4 billion.
summary_zh: KKR 同意收购职业体育特许经营权股权投资者 Arctos Partners，交易最初价值 14 亿美元。
